data.name: Masked HERO Blast
data.desc: Must be Special Summoned with "Mask Change". If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; its ATK becomes half its current ATK. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can pay 500 LP, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; return it to the hand.

card_sets.set_name: Weekly Shonen Jump October 2016 membership promotional card
